title: Limited Edition Pink & Blue Panaracer Gravelking tires now available, will sell out
content:
Announced a few weeks ago, this year’s special edition Flamingo Pink and Pansy Blue Panaracer Gravelking tires are now available for order, and they say they’ll sell out like every other year. These single-run, limited edition colored Gravelking tires are made with the same ZSG tire compound technology, anti-flat casing and 120tpi construction as the […]

The post Limited Edition Pink & Blue Panaracer Gravelking tires now available, will sell out appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
